Text:
Thanks for posting the episode and the promo for the next one!!!!! As always the quality is 10/10 :D
You're awesome. 
I'd be grateful if you could post the episodes and the promos and the end for the rest of the season!!!
HUGE  THANKS  again!!!!!

sydcasy: I had a good laugh about your comment "As always the quality is 10/10".

AFG has a very mixed record of quality - just ask fans of The Daily Show, The Colbert Report etc.
